LLM_Sentence: for his prowess at pretending to play the song, the guinness book awarded him a record for best guitar hero player in the world.

being the goat at two video game simulations of real-life activities (both of which have all but vanished outside of dave & busters and round1 arcades) is a pretty niche thing to devote your life to.
chike first tried ddr in 2005, after his older brother got him a copy of the game for his thirteenth birthday.
in fact, chike began collecting followers as soon as he started uploading videos of his performances online, under the username iamchris4life.
at his mothers request, many of those early clips are shot from the waist down, his signature basketball shorts swooshing around his lanky legs.
